divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and I were watching fireworks.. looking towards mt wachusett the blinking red light from walmart moutain. When to the left of the light a bright orange glow starting coming up I thought it must be a plane but when the light hit the clouds it slowly disappeared and never flew over.. then I looked back again another one had started to take the same path but this one was a copper color and it took the same path again and did the samething.. then while the fireworks were going off a very deep red light moved from the moutain again went probably a 100 feets up and moved towards another hill or mountain in the distance and desended below tree line at a fast pace Very random stuff..
